瞾字的基本解释

瞾
zhào
“曌（照）”的讹字。

瞾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhào］
同“曌1”。
唐武则天造此字用作己名。

瞾字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　瞾； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页819第04
【字彙】同照。○按《正字通》：唐武后自制十九字，以曌爲名，與照音義同，从明，非从二目也。後譌爲瞾。《略記字始》譌爲?。《字彙》改作瞾，《字彙補》又作?，?非。?字原作朋下空。

瞾字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
瞾字的起名意思

唐武则天造此字用作己名。

Lei
Basic explanation of words
Lei
zhào
The corrupt word "Zhao (photo)".
Lei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhào］
Same as "曌1".
Tang Wu Zetian made this character for his own name.
Lei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Headword Department] 　瞾; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 819 04
【Vocabulary】Same photo. ○According to "Zhengzitong": After Tang Wu, 19 characters were made by himself. The name is Zhao, which has the same meaning as the sound, from the Ming to the second head. Hou Chi is a lei. "Lie Ji Zi Shi" Jia Wei?. "Zihui" was changed to Lei, and "Zihuibu" was also used as "Zihui", "No". ? The original word Peng Xiakong.
